text: Would it be possible to add 'Clone module' on the drag'n'drop edit page. I've come across it a few times now where a client is creating similar content to the previous module but didn't require another custom module.
Absolutely. That would be very helpful.

It would be great if we could expose the Blog Listing pages for editing on the Content Editor side as the integration with custom modules becomes more and more prevalent. Currently, with local dev, that content is getting hard set in the coded file or separate custom modules are being added.

Concept:
Allow content editor to switch to 'Listing View' in the page editor to edit the listing page with options to edit the listing displayed content on specifically this blog or to edit on all blog instances the module is used on : similar to global content editor.
Even simply the latter option (to edit globally across all blogs using that listing template) would be very helpful
